title: Ascentia Gaming- Looking for a gold-plat top laner.
body:
Hello everyone,
Looking for a top laner who is willing to practice regularly and participate in tournaments when the team is ready. Here at Ascentia Gaming we work with our players to improve their teamplay and communication while keeping a positive and fun environment. You can message me over league or bump this post with your ign if your interested.

IGN: Sabersedge1997
(PS we have an e-girl)

replies.body:
This is not NA server 

This is: [https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/)
